item.title: Faster Neighborhood Attention: Reducing the O(n^2) Cost of Self Attention at the Threadblock Level
item.description: This research dramatically accelerates neighborhood attention, a cost-effective self-attention mechanism, through novel GEMM-based and fused kernel implementations, boosting performance by up to 1759%…
